column1: Little Goat Diner////We approve of Little Goat! After much deliberation
column2: we went with the Bull's Eye French Toast (Rosemary French Toast
column3: with an ooey gooey egg hidden inside
column5: strawberries and syrup) paired with crispy hash browns
column6: filled with white cheddar cheese. Adorable spot
column8: and the best place to sit is at the counter where you can see everyone's order come out and *drool* while you wait!
